General.Name: Odyssey Marine Exploration Inc
General.Description: Odyssey Marine Exploration, Inc., along with its subsidiaries, discovers, validates, and develops seafloor mineral resources. The company explores for phosphate and gold. Additionally, it provides specialized mineral exploration, project development, and marine services to clients. Odyssey Marine Exploration, Inc. is headquartered in Tampa, Florida.
General.Address: 205 South Hoover Boulevard, Tampa, FL, United States, 33609
